description.value:
1. Seeker of Truth: -3 Willpower. Gain Foresight Talent and Enemy (Academics or Ecclesiarchy).
2. Xenophile: +10 to Fellowship Tests when dealing with alien races or cultures. -5 to Willpower Tests involving alien artifacts and alien psychic powers.
3. Fated for Greatness: Gain +1 Fate Point and 1d10+1 Insanity Points.

requirements.text: Origin Path: Lure of the Void
